alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:12PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Luna County through 345 PM MDT... At 310 PM MDT, off duty N W S Meteorologist reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Faywood to 6 miles northeast of Deming to 6 miles west of Akela. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph with blowing dust and pea size hail. SOURCE...Off duty N W S Meteorologist. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deming, Sunshine, Rock Hound State Park and Spring Canyon State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 73 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
